Movies.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
Movies.Writer: James Gunn, Dan Abnett, Andy Lanning
Movies.Actors: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista
Movies.Plot: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father, the ambitious celestial being Ego.

Movies.Title: The Dark Knight
Movies.Actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart
Movies.Plot: When the menace known as The Joker emerges, Batman must confront one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Movies.Title: Forrest Gump
Movies.Actors: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise
Movies.Plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

Movies.Title: Inception
Movies.Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
Movies.Plot: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets faces a new challenge when tasked with planting an idea into someone's mind.

Movies.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Movies.Actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton
Movies.Plot: Two imprisoned men form a bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Movies.Title: Pulp Fiction
Movies.Actors: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson
Movies.Plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Movies.Title: The Matrix
Movies.Actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
Movies.Plot: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Movies.Title: The Godfather
Movies.Writer: Mario Puzo (screenplay by), Francis Ford Coppola (screenplay by)
Movies.Actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan
Movies.Plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Movies.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Movies.Actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
Movies.Plot: A young hobbit, Frodo, who has found the One Ring, begins his journey to Mount Doom to destroy it.

Movies.Title: Fight Club
Movies.Actors: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter
Movies.Plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

Movies.Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Movies.Actors: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney
Movies.Plot: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Movies.Title: The Avengers
Movies.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson
Movies.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

Movies.Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Movies.Writer: Stefan Zweig (inspired by the writings of), Wes Anderson (screenplay)
Movies.Actors: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric
Movies.Plot: A quirky comedy revolving around the adventures of a hotel concierge and his protege as they become involved in the theft and recovery of a priceless Renaissance painting.

Movies.Title: Jurassic Park
Movies.Actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum
Movies.Plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

Movies.Title: The Social Network
Movies.Actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Andrew Garfield, Justin Timberlake
Movies.Plot: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

Movies.Title: The Departed
Movies.Writer: William Monahan (screenplay), Alan Mak, Felix Chong
Movies.Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson
Movies.Plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

Movies.Title: The Incredibles
Movies.Actors: Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter
Movies.Plot: A family of undercover superheroes is forced into action to save the world while dealing with the everyday challenges of family life.

Movies.Title: The Lion King
Movies.Actors: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones
Movies.Plot: Lion prince Simba learns to become king with the help of his friends after his father is murdered.

Movies.Title: The Shining
Movies.Actors: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd
Movies.Plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

Movies.Title: Inglourious Basterds
Movies.Actors: Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth
Movies.Plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

Movies.Title: The Green Mile
Movies.Actors: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse
Movies.Plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

Movies.Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Movies.Director: Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman, Bob Persichetti
Movies.Writer: Phil Lord (screenplay by), Rodney Rothman (screenplay by)
Movies.Actors: Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld
Movies.Plot: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Movies.Title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Movies.Actors: Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr.
Movies.Plot: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

Movies.Title: Spider-Man
Movies.Writer: Stan Lee (Marvel comic book), Steve Ditko (Marvel comic book)
Movies.Actors: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe
Movies.Plot: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

Movies.Title: Spider-Man 2
Movies.Writer: Stan Lee (Marvel comic book), Steve Ditko (Marvel comic book)
Movies.Actors: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina
Movies.Plot: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

Movies.Title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
Movies.Actors: Tom Holland, Samuel L. Jackson, Jake Gyllenhaal
Movies.Plot: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame (2019), Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.

Movies.Title: Avengers: Endgame Part II

Movies.Plot: Shang-Chi, a Chinese martial artist who became a skilled fighter after moving to the United States, is sought after by both his own father and the Chinese government.

Movies.Actors: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston
Movies.Plot: Thor fights to restore order across the cosmos but finds himself in a race against the grandmaster's powerful new nemesis, a cosmic being more powerful than anyone.
